title: Re-Scue - However you lived your past, today you’re the key to changing your future
description: Consecutive lifetimes locked in a passionate hunt of blood and sex, but what if the prey wants more?ReScue Series Book 1GENRE: GLBT, Gay, Paranormal, Dark Fantasy, BDSM, Contemporary, m/m, m/f/fTHEMES: BDSM, Gay, Hetero, Time Travel, Shape Shifting, Past Lives, Contemporary, Futuristic, HistoricalOnly one rule: never fall in love. But the sex and blood is just too good to pass up. So what to do? Blood and sex are the only fair game he, the hunter, allows me, his prey, to have in our passionate chase through time and space. And for his sake, I’ve had more lives than I care to count. From one life to the next, I played his savage game, hungering for him in a way no amount of blood or sex could ever satisfy me. But not anymore! So how to beat him at his own game and get away with it?Don’t miss the exciting prequel to Tasting Leon’s Mark, now available!
author: Laura Tolomei
